A

add(Figure) - Method in class hotciv.view.CivDrawing
The CivDrawing should not allow client side units to add and manipulate figures; only figures that renders game objects are relevant, and these should be handled by observer events from the game instance.

CivDrawing - Class in hotciv.view
CivDrawing is a specialized Drawing (model component) from MiniDraw that dynamically builds the list of Figures for MiniDraw to render the Unit and other information objects that are visible in the Game instance.

MapAlgorithms - Class in hotciv.view
A library of algorithms used to draw a FreeCiv like map, that is, a map that draws coastlines properly for the oceans to avoid the rectangular look of using ordinary tiles.

worldChangedAt(Position) - Method in interface hotciv.framework.GameObserver
invoked every time some change occurs on a position in the world - a unit disappears or appears, a city appears, a city changes player color, or any other event that requires the GUI to redraw the graphics on a particular position.
